definition: to worry about/to be concerned about
to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: My thoughts still cling to the moldering Past.
sentences.chinese: 我的思绪依然牵挂着前尘旧梦。

sentences.english: There were people to get back to, and I knew who they were.
sentences.chinese: 家里有让我牵挂的人，我也知道这些人到底是谁。

sentences.english: He didn't have a care in the world as he waddled down the street.
sentences.chinese: 他摇摇摆摆走过大街的样子好像对这个世界毫无牵挂。

sentences.english: Don't you know that I still care for you?
sentences.chinese: 难道你不知道我仍牵挂着你？

sentences.english: I got homesick, which has been a bugbear suspending in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我患了思乡病，我一直牵挂着我的家乡。

sentences.english: And her eyes on all my motions with a mute observance hung.
sentences.chinese: 她的双眸沉默而拘谨地牵挂着我的一举一动。

sentences.english: He had no ties at all in Hung Tung except his overtaxed pork business.
sentences.chinese: 在洪洞县除了课税很重的猪肉生意以外，他一无牵挂。

sentences.english: Because, that is one kind of hope, is also one kind worries and reposes.
sentences.chinese: 因为，那是一种希望，也是一种牵挂和寄托。

sentences.english: Became the abyss of time again of concern about with hard eliminate distress of Mi.
sentences.chinese: 又成了永恒的牵挂和难以消弥的伤痛。

sentences.english: Deep care, like a long cane rooted in people's soul.
sentences.chinese: 深深的牵挂，像一根长藤扎根在人们的魂灵。

sentences.english: Love is a kind of care, every second with my heart in a few.
sentences.chinese: 爱更是一种牵挂，每秒都在数着自己的心跳。

sentences.english: Michael's long-suffering soul mate is dead and she ain't comin' back.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔长期牵挂的伴侣已经死了永远都不会回来了。

sentences.english: Mrs. Smith, you are always worried about your children.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯太太，你总是牵挂着孩子。

sentences.english: Care, in the old time, cemented a lonesome flower.
sentences.chinese: 牵挂，在老去的时光里，凝成一朵寂寞的花。

sentences.english: Tao Huayuan was not in the United States, missing it.
sentences.chinese: 陶花源不在美，有了思念则牵挂。

sentences.english: A virtuous person chest without care, let destiny without hardship.
sentences.chinese: 有德者胸无牵挂，听凭天命而没有忧患。

definition: to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to think of/to long for/to miss
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again
to think of/to keep thinking about/to be concerned about
reluctant to leave/to hate to have to go/to recall fondly
to be fondly attached to/to not wish to part with/to cling to
person living or traveling far from home
